name: Camp Destiny
description:
When a trip to Camp Greenwood starts out normally, it only takes one thing to change it forever..

Your trip to Camp Greenwood this time will put you in a situation where there’s someone new that you’ve never seen before. This is normal, right? Well it turns out that this individual is really nice. You’ll find that as you continue playing, there are different endings and scenarios, as well as multiple choice confession scenes! Choose the right answers or you’ll be friendzoned... or even worse, rejected!

FAQ:

Q “The characters don’t move, why?” - A: “It was a college project, so I had a little less time than usual to make this game. It would take a while to draw out different poses and would be overkill at the moment. Maybe in a future update we’ll have dynamic posing.”

Q “Why did you not get help from others or use Royalty-free resources?” - A: “I wanted to keep everything as primary as possible, meaning every asset in this game was made entirely by myself. If possible, in the future or for a future game in this series I might incorporate voice acting and other such resources from people that aren’t just me.”

Q “Any Easter eggs?” - A: “Yes. Three Easter eggs where two of them get you an ending. The other lets you play the game normally but with subtle dialogue changes.”

Q “How many endings are there?” - A: “Around six or so. Try and find them all.”
